name: Web Vision
description: A Chrome extension that eb Vision the webpage's content with just one click. Support 40+ languages.

scripts.package: zip -u -r build/package.zip _locales css img js sound *.html manifest.json || true
scripts.sync-page-scripts: rsync -avz js/messaging.js page-scripts/ && aws s3 sync --delete --metadata-directive REPLACE --cache-control max-age=86400

author: Great Mates
